name: Galactic Cluster
description:
Support us: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=3L5FEEP49CDPL

Game features:
-High speed tower defense game. Download for free.
-Enemies could evade your attacks, take different routes, attack key points from a distance, among other surprises.
-Upgrade system. Improve your towers in multiple parameters and as you see fit according to the situation.
-No ads. Play comfortably and without interruptions.
-Compatible with most smartphones. Fast loading speeds.
-Can be played both offline and online.
-Simple and easy to understand. Includes an optional tutorial translated to multiple languages.
-No game account creation required to play. Just open the app on your mobile phone, or PC (using an emulator of your choice) and play!

Mysterious portals have appeared and human nations have been able to prosper like never before. However, these portals suddenly disappeared without a trace. The wars for resources have begun. Your adventure as an explorer and survivor begins!
